mapper.sql: grc.id, grc.user_id, grc.order_sn, grc.sku_sn, grc.return_type, grc.reason, `explain`, grc.redemption, grc.tag_type, grc.exterior_type, grc.gift_type, grc.contact_name, grc.contact_mobile, grc.contact_telephone_area, grc.contact_telephone, grc.contact_telephone_branch, grc.remark, grc.status, grc.return_sum, `create`, returnchange_sn,orn.return_sn,return_pay_sn, oi.trans_type,oi.total_fee,oi.question_status,og.goods_name,og.transaction_price,grc.site_code,grc.shop_code, grc.shop_name,grc.store_code,grc.store_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from goods_return_change grc
inner join master_order_info_history oi on grc.order_sn=oi.master_order_sn
inner join master_order_info oi on grc.order_sn=oi.master_order_sn
left join master_order_goods og on oi.master_order_sn=og.master_order_sn left join order_return orn on orn.relating_order_sn=grc.order_sn left join order_refund ord on ord.relating_return_sn=orn.return_sn
group by grc.id
order by ${orderByClause}
limit ${criterion.value},${criterion.secondValue}

select count(1) from ( select count(*) from goods_return_change grc
inner join master_order_info_history oi on grc.order_sn=oi.master_order_sn
inner join master_order_info oi on grc.order_sn=oi.master_order_sn
left join master_order_goods og on oi.master_order_sn=og.master_order_sn left join order_return orn on orn.relating_order_sn=grc.order_sn left join order_refund ord on ord.relating_return_sn=orn.return_sn
group by grc.id ) aa

select custom_code skuSn, transaction_price transactionPrice, discount discount, sum(goods_number) goodsNum from master_order_goods og where og.master_order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by og.custom_code
